headline: Is There an Opportunity in Darden Restaurants After Shares Slide 13% in Recent Weeks?
summary: If you are trying to make sense of Darden Restaurants’ recent stock performance, you are definitely not alone. For anyone who has watched this industry leader serve up years of growth, the past month or so may look like a curveball: Darden’s shares have dipped 4.3% in the last week and dropped 13.0% over the last 30 days. But step back, and that short-term spill stands out against a five-year gain of over 124.2% and a healthy 21.5% jump in the past year. Clearly, there is still appetite for...
